TEXT.S:
Mark Alarie(Â·) 12 bulad 11 demiad, 1963 a mihca, Mark Alarie, miunduay. Mark Alarie nalecuhan i Phoenix, Arizona, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Mark Alarie unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u tabakiay ayaway mimaliay. Mark Alarie i 1986 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 18, namapili' tu nu Denver Nuggets putiput.
kakuniza
